name: The Sundered Frontier
description: The southern half of Odus bears the scars of a reality tug-of-war between the Void and the Underfoot. The erudites of Paineel call this land their home, as do the reclusive Hua Mein. Below the arid surface lurk the denizens of the Hole - the devious roekillik seek a way to escape their confines, while the mighty elementals of the Underfoot prepare to march forth at the command of the might Master Yael.
